title: How to get a hold of Dr. Dre - Quora

response.answer_text: Ugh. I’m curious why. But I’m under the impression that you’re trying to solicit your services to him or drop him a demo. Just..don’t. If it’s an emergency, like you found his wallet, you’ll find a way. If you need Dre call Eminem. But seriously if a Dire emergency of yours or his, contact Shady Records/Aftermath Records and explain the severity of reason and if it is seriously an issue someone will make sure it gets to him by chain of command. Good night.
